item.title: Singapore Airlines has been ranked as the airline with the highest positive buzz in Singapore, according to YouGov
item.description:
Source: Yougov. YouGov, a market research firm, has identified the leading brands in Singapore across various sectors based on their “buzz.” These rankings, reflecting average “Buzz” scores from January to December 2015, offer insights into brands that garnered the most positive attention from the general public. Here’s a glimpse of the top-ranking brands: Ecommerce and mCommerce: Q0010 leads the pack, followed by Groupon and Carousell. Retail: Fashion: Uniqlo secures the top spot, with H&M and Robinsons trailing behind...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-airlines-has-been-ranked-as-the-airline-with-the-highest-positive-buzz-in-singapore-according-to-yougov/
